snippet.title: Owl Observatory - You have to stay for dinner! - Trailer #1
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2633510/Owl_Observatory/
The 🦉 is finally BACK! 
"Owl Observatory" 🔭, a prequel to "Dinner with an Owl". 
WISHLIST NOW on Steam!

Embark on a surreal, time-looping journey in this horror comedy point-and-click adventure with a delicious twist. You have to stay for dinner - At the Owl Observatory! 

Like, subscribe and follow us on X:
Timo Wegener (Game) https://twitter.com/BoringSubDad 
Bastian Windszus (Music) https://twitter.com/BasteeW
Elena Schulz (Key Art) https://twitter.com/Ellie_Libelle

Voices:
Martyn Owen aka WarmVoice as Mr. Brooks
Check out his channel: https://www.youtube.com/@WarmVoice
Allen Donnelly as Mr. Brahe
Kim Reiko as Ms. Wollaston and Ms. Merrit
Elise Holvik as Ms. Kepler
Max Palasi as George

Presskit: https://impress.games/press-kit/boringsuburbandad/owl-observatory

While waiting for Owl Observatory, get Dinner with an Owl on Steam for free: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1567420/Dinner_with_an_Owl/
To support our work, please consider buying the official soundtrack: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1567470/Dinner_with_an_Owl_Soundtrack/
